
#line 1
struct v2f {
    vec4 pos;
    vec2 uv;
    vec4 color;
};
#line 7
#line 7
vec4 xlat_main( in v2f i ) {
    vec4 c;
    c = i.color;
    #line 11
    c.xy += i.uv;
    return c;
}
varying vec2 xlv_TEXCOORD0;
varying vec4 xlv_COLOR;
void main() {
    vec4 xl_retval;
    v2f xlt_i;
    xlt_i.pos = vec4(0.0);
    xlt_i.uv = vec2(xlv_TEXCOORD0);
    xlt_i.color = vec4(xlv_COLOR);
    xl_retval = xlat_main( xlt_i);
    gl_FragData[0] = vec4(xl_retval);
}
